content: How was it in anyone’s interest that this conflict in Syria and this catastrophe in the greater Middle East continue? funneling public dollars into the wasteful bureaucracy that is our defense department? distracting the public with badass planes and missiles while public services are gutted in order to give the wealthy tax breaks? the security of Israel so that the second coming of Jesus Christ can be witnessed by American evangelicals? scaring idiot racists and demonizing brown people in order to secure votes? America is the world’s biggest war profiteer. I thought this guy was smart.
